p: Mutant spectra heterogeneity was determined using the normalized Shannon entropy (SE) calculation according to the formula − [Σ i ( pi x lnpi)]/ lnN], where pi is the frequency of each sequence in the mutant spectrum and N is the total number of sequences compared (Volkenstein, 1994). SE values range from 0 (all sequences are identical) to 1 (all sequences are different).
